website_summaries.verdict: A central station for all your hair care needs, but not the best choice if you have limited counter space.
pros: Space to hold other hair care items
Base is heavy and won't tip
cons: Won't free up room on a cluttered countertop

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy base, no pwr switch for outlets
customer_reviews.text: Got as gift for wife but when I did a more permanent install of it in the bathroom was sturdy and my wife loves having the 3 outlets built into the stand. Only problem she still has is with cord management while they're in the stand, I haven't found a good solution for that yet that will make it quick and easy for her to tidy up the cords and pull them back out just as easy. The length of the power cord, despite being a little shorter than what I needed to get it out to the corner of the counter, is a good length for normally putting in a bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty J

customer_reviews.title: The electrical receptacles are mounted upside down.
customer_reviews.text: Works great to hold the flat iron, curling iron, and hair dryer. But. The electrical receptacles are mounted upside down. With GFI style plugs (common with bathroom hair care tools), the tool plugs are heavy. When plugged in upside down (with the tool wire at the top), they tend to lean out, creating a gap at the top. Poor design of this stand. So. I added a block style adapter to prevent strain on the tool plugs, and prevent them from leaning (pulling) out.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Money Well Spent!
customer_reviews.text: This has made life so much easier since I use my heat tools almost daily. It was a hastle having to consistently put them away and roll up the chords. Now, I can simply take them off the rack and place them back on it when I'm done. The outlets are extremely useful because I can have all my products connected and I don't have to take up any wall outlets. Overall I am very happy with this and I recommend it to everyone. Disclaimer: I did NOT receive any product or discount for review. All products are purchased by me at regular price and therefore, all opinions are my own. Hope this was helpful to anyone considering this product.
customer_reviews.author: Khalysee

customer_reviews.title: No what I expected, but not terrible either.
customer_reviews.text: This holder was a bit disappointing because the two barrels in the back are so tiny; there's no way any kind of hot tool could fit in them. However, I was able to utilize them with two of my hair brushes that I frequently use. My hair dryer and my curling iron did fit perfectly, so I was extremely happy about that cause those are basically the only two hot tools I use. My flat iron, which I never use, didn't fit anywhere,so I didn't fret about that too much. I do LOVE the fact that this stand has outlets: super convenient! The stand is also very sturdy. I'm keeping this.. It keeps my vanity looking tidy! :)
customer_reviews.author: Cory R. Tabor

customer_reviews.title: Where's the Item I bought?
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this stand and loved the way it looked. But then I took a second look and realized I'd paid for a version with outlets for my curling irons and received one that had no outlets at all. I also had trouble when I tried to return the item with Amazon's return site. It kept giving me an error message. I like it but want what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Khalilah Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Accessory
customer_reviews.text: This thing makes my life about 10x easier. Since my beauty tools live in/on a vanity table, this frees up drawer space and now I don't have to twist and bind my cords in a way that's damaging to my tools. For those who are looking at this to possibly house your large (1"+) curling irons, but also want it to hold your hair dryer and flat iron, that's just not going to happen, but my 1" flat iron, 3/4" curling iron, medium round brush, wet brush, and hair dryer fit perfectly. From a former hairdresser to other stylists out there: you want this. Especially if you have a small station or work from home.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Turnbow

customer_reviews.title: Falls short on expectations
customer_reviews.text: This is a great concept the falls short on results. The base is fairly solid and holds the hair dryer and curling iron with no issues. There are three round cylinders however only one is large enough to hold a curling iron or hair straightener. Sadly the other cylinders are too small to hold anything but a hair brush. Not sure why Sononiture didn’t go the extra step to provide room for other hair products. I like the product it just doesn’t work for what I need. I would not recommend buying at this time. Perhaps if the cylinders are made larger
customer_reviews.author: rhonda m.

customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I don't have a socket in my bathroom and all of my power cords are on the floor so this really helps me with doing my hair on my dresser instead of having to sit down on my floor. Also I love that I can have this on the dresser and charge my phone with it while I do my hair. Lastly, it's nice to have a place to set my curling wand without risking burning a hole in something.
customer_reviews.author: Onyx

customer_reviews.title: Mine works really great. Looks exactly like that
customer_reviews.text: Mine works really great. Looks exactly like that. However, i assumed I could fit my straightener, blow dryer and curling iron, but the holes are smaller than you might think. My curling iron (it's medium sized) fits the middle one, and I pull my straighten in the big one. I have a mini blow dryer and it would fit in the big one, but my straightener does not fit anywhere else. so i hang my blower on the circle thing (which i think that's what it is for hahah) but it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Great option for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This little stand is heavy duty and works well to hold hair appliances. My only complaints, as others have mentioned, is that the two small barrel holders can't really hold my 32mm wand. It works well for my 25mm, though, and the larger barrel holds my flat iron. I use one of the smaller barrels to hold my round hair brush instead. I also wish it had some type of cord management brackets to wrap the appliance cords around. The included outlet allowed the stand to be moved quite a distance from the wall outlet, which is nice. It has a heavy base to support the weight of all my hair tools!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer 04

customer_reviews.title: For small irons only, base is pretty big. Check measurements.
customer_reviews.text: This item is a great idea. This item however doesn’t allow for big/large barrel irons, which I use. Straighteners Dont fit either. The base of this item is bigger than I have room for too. Check measurements. Otherwise great item. Love the electrical outlet at the top. Was disappointed that it didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELE

customer_reviews.title: It is ok
customer_reviews.text: It holds the hair dryer and curling irons but the plugs on it are 1-upside down and 2- too close together to be of use with appliances that have a safety button. You can only use one of the three. If you have an older appliance with just a regular plug it should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: J. K. Bronaugh

customer_reviews.title: 4.5 Stars - Helps with all my hair tools
customer_reviews.text: I only have one outlet with two plug-in sockets in my bathroom (Who designs bathrooms, there should be two at least!?) This helped as I was able to utilize the outlet on this stand and keep all my hair accessories (dryer, curling iron, straightener) off the floor. Simple to assemble. I only wish they had a way to wrap the cords so they don't dangle as much, but I solved that by using twist ties to minimize cord tangling.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hagemann

customer_reviews.title: wish it was bigger, but i like it
customer_reviews.text: the only criticism i have on this product is that i wish the hols for the blow dryer was about a 1/2 inch bigger. i need more room for my blow dryer when my diffuser is on. when the diffuser is off, its a perfect fit though. i like this and would def recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Shonna Logan

customer_reviews.title: I just love this! I have room for everything
customer_reviews.text: I just love this! I have room for everything! And I didn't even see when I ordered it that it had an outlet on it. The only bad part is when you first get it and use like a hot iron, or a curling wand while it's hot, it smells like burning paint. But whatever. I love it! I would get it again if I had the choice!
customer_reviews.author: Karmen D

customer_reviews.title: You get what you see
customer_reviews.text: It's not a complex stand so you get exactly what's shown. The only issue we had was the attached outlets kept clicking when my wife was using the hairdryer and tripping my GFI outlet. As soon as I plugged it directly into the wall everything was good. Attached outlets are junk but the stand part works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Rick

customer_reviews.title: Sturdyish
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this guy for a bit now and I love the functionality but the power strip can come off the screws pretty easily. Otherwise it’s sturdy. The screw that keeps the tower stead on the base comes loose super rarely, but not annoying as I just keep an eye on it.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Febles

customer_reviews.title: Only had power 8 months, purchased if Feb and now it doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: Only worked for 8 months and that’s not with daily use. I used it 2 x per week with a couple of months off because i had braids 2x since i purchased this. I only use it for my personal hair and i don’t use heat on my hair daily. So now it’s just a stand because it no longer has power when plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Krishonda Lanier

customer_reviews.title: Not universal
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my station and it's nice other than the fact that my babybliss blow dryer doesn't fit in the dryer spot. If you have a blow dryer with a shorter nozzle this is not for you
customer_reviews.author: David&dest

customer_reviews.title: Freed up space
customer_reviews.text: This organizer saves me so much space in my tiny bathroom! I love that I can keep everything plugged in and all the accessories or tools I need are within reach.
customer_reviews.author: Ellyn

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Need something for my curling irons and hair dryer. Did not want everything on counter top. Not enough room and messy. Installed outlet in cabinet. Use this inside my vanity cabinet. Now I never have to plug in or unplug a thing. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: grandma W

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Very good helps save space wish it had a way to keep cords separated and more plugs and a bigger barrel holder for my 1.5 inch straightener only holds 1 inch but have about 6 tools on it holding them fine all working well. Gave the 4 stars because it does a good job but I would want it to do a few more things.
customer_reviews.author: CRG

customer_reviews.title: Organized
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. My hairdresser had one and she told me where to get it. I love it. Sits on top of my makeup table. Holds my hairdryer and straightener brush. The two holders in the back are too small to hold irons, possibly those skinny ones, but I'll use it to hold a hairbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: Great Holder
customer_reviews.text: Made my own vanity and this was one of the items I put on it. It easily holds my hair dryer, straightener, and two brushes. The stand doesn't slide around, good material.
customer_reviews.author: Gizmo’s Human

customer_reviews.title: Keeps all my hair tools together.
customer_reviews.text: I bough this product and have loved it from day one. No problems with the power, I have my dryer, straighter connected on it and 0 problems. Absolutely recommend 100% great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holes to small
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice but my curling iron doesn’t fit ! Holes are way to small If u have a big curing iron or I should say medium size ! Will not fit !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this stand
customer_reviews.text: I love this stand!! I used to have to wait for everything to warm up because I could not plug stuff in at the same time in my bathroom. Now, with the additional outlets on this stand, I can start warming my flat iron & curling iron while I'm blow drying my hair. It also keeps the cords neater and in one place. Great item - try it!!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Too Big
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and returned it’s a lot bulkyier then I thought it would be so too big to sit on my vanity. My brush and straightener didn’t fit without and sliding at an angle
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Product came in two pieces with no screw or bolt or anything to combine them.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus & Marquita Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: None of my hair accessories fit into the holders. It was way too small and is now sitting under my vanity.
customer_reviews.author: Mfa720

customer_reviews.title: Great and well built.
customer_reviews.text: Heavier than it looks. Assembled with 1 wingnut on the bottom. Only thing missing is a slot for 2 inch flatiron.
customer_reviews.author: Pro Makeup Artist4Life

customer_reviews.title: Fits a flat iron but missing holder for wider curling iron
customer_reviews.text: Like this but I wish they had one more larger curling iron holder since my iron is wider. Don't know why they have two holders for small irons as many women use a flat iron (you can use the large one shown for this) and a wider curling iron rather than two of the same small irons. Who uses two small irons? Love the idea though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Saves tons of counter space for my daughter and i can rest assure that the house isn't going to burn down with all her appliances since they are neatly stored in stand. Fits blow dryer. Flat iron, curling iron, wave iron. Perfect for organizing bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: TDE

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I love the that it has a mini power strip and all the spaces to hold my hot tools and brushes. Helps keep organized. Sturdy and professional looking!
customer_reviews.author: Marianela Gulke

customer_reviews.title: A very useful product.
customer_reviews.text: I put this in the main bathroom. Always have friends that want to borrow something when they stay, so I set this up with a hair dryer, blow brush, straightener and curling iron and no more rummaging around to find these things! The plug in outlets are the reason I bought this as you only need the unit's plug to plug into the wall. I encourage anyone that is using all these hair appliance to get this product.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Harding

customer_reviews.title: Love being organized!
customer_reviews.text: I love having outlets right on it but disliked assembling the rubber ring myself to the bottom so it doesn't slip. I only gave it 4 stars as i actually havent used it yet but it is ver sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Lorilynn

customer_reviews.title: You need this...trust me!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product!!!! I was sick of my flat iron, blow dryer, curling wand, etc...being scattered around always making everything look a mess. Assembly was very easy and it was put together in seconds! Now my hair tools are neatly displayed and accessible!!
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Strong
customer_reviews.text: I simply love it , it holds all my products , iron and blow dryer, the stand is sturdy and strong , one plug and all three devices are up and running, my bathroom now is less cluttered and organized, my own little beauty salon.
customer_reviews.author: Dina Blackwood Richards

customer_reviews.title: Well made & durable.
customer_reviews.text: This is very handy item for all your electric hair styling items. It's great with the outlets right in the base.
customer_reviews.author: koala53

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this product!
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s been a great product. It holds all my items and does not fall over with weight. It does not get hot either which is great! Very affordable too!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: I like that I have a place to put my hot ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered this for myself. I like that I have a place to put my hot curling flat iron and regular curling iron while curling my hair. I also like that it gives me a few more plug ins. It keeps the cords from getting tangling, and I don't worry about the heat damaging my counter.. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Lady

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality/very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. It was well packaged and much stronger than I anticipated!!! Perfect for my vanity
customer_reviews.author: Lori C.

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love with this.
customer_reviews.text: I love this because it has a plug in and the on it it has where you can plug 3 more things in. Nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: mom2jav

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my blow dryer, curling and flat iron! Saved a ton of space!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl peterson

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not great
customer_reviews.text: It occupies more space than expected and cords tangle easily 😞
customer_reviews.author: Shaula shaula

customer_reviews.title: Nice organizer and space saver
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It helps me organize my hair station at home. I’m not a hair stylist but I have so much stuff that is nice to have them organized and ready to go with the outlet on it.
customer_reviews.author: Gi Lawlor

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to organize my hair styling products and I’m very pleased with it. The electric plugs are a little close together but manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S

customer_reviews.title: Odd appearance (in my opinion,) but good product
customer_reviews.text: I do not believe this is the most attractive holder, but it does the job well and cuts down on clutter. It is a well made product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: The electrical outlet on the front means no more unplugging one item to plug in the other.
customer_reviews.text: OMG Something to clean up all of those curling irons and blow dryer. The electrical outlet on the front means no more unplugging one item to plug in the other.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria T.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but the iron holders are small
customer_reviews.text: It’s definitely helpful, but I have a variety of tools and the big irons don’t fit. That’s unfortunate because it really helps keeping the table more organized
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Helps with organization
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stand it helps me stay organized and have access to my irons and keep them out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Love shopping

customer_reviews.title: Styling tools stand
customer_reviews.text: Good product and I have this on my bathroom counter.
customer_reviews.author: Angela J McCubbin

customer_reviews.title: A place for everything
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. I love it. We got tired of seeing blow dryer and curling iron laying out. This hold everything nicely and provides circuit switch for protection.
customer_reviews.author: Moeller

customer_reviews.title: Holes too small
customer_reviews.text: The holes were too small to fit my curling iron and flat iron.
customer_reviews.author: ajaalise💋

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for the wife to help control all the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the wife to help control all the hair-care devices on the counter. Still a lot of cords around, but at least the devices have a little more organization to them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy stand, has not fallen over
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy stand, has not fallen over, and I use all three slots. I can comfortably leave my curler on at 450 degrees since it is metal. Has not worn at all, so it is not prone to scratches, dents, etc. Awesome quality holder for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Myrabi

customer_reviews.title: N/A
customer_reviews.text: I should have sent it back but I needed something now. The rubber piece that goes around the bottom, to keep it from sliding, will not stay on. Holes for the curling iron are way smaller than the description.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!! Did exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! Did exactly what I needed! Made room on my counter and place to actually put my stuff! Sucks that the curler I have doesn't fit (i have an automatic curler so its a lot bigger than the regular curlers) but I do fit my hair brush in it instead. LOVE that it has 3 plug ins. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! I wanted something to hold my straightener but this one holds all my hair styling tools! That's a plus. It's also metal so when you leave your straightener on by accident you won't burn your house down.
customer_reviews.author: L77

customer_reviews.title: Don't burn your furniture or hands
customer_reviews.text: No problem with assembly - One screw and wing nut. So far I think its excellent and is holding my dryer, and three different curling irons (assorted sizes. Not enough plugs for all of them but I'm only one short and I can swap it out as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Cathie G.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't take to much peace and it all organized love it
customer_reviews.author: Maribel Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Keeps everythig organized and out of the way!
customer_reviews.text: Totally in love with this thing! It's a great way to maximize your outlets without creating too much clutter. My bathroom is pretty small so I ended up relocating all my styling tools to my bedroom where I do my makeup in front of a huge mirror, and it's been a great success thanks to this product C:
customer_reviews.author: X3N1A

customer_reviews.title: It is great if you have smaller curling irons though
customer_reviews.text: The holes are a lot smaller than they look. It is great if you have smaller curling irons though.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Works well,but had some issues.
customer_reviews.text: The product came scratches, and the rubber rim won't stay on. However it's functional and does what it says it does.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I'm obsessed with this silly device
customer_reviews.text: This thing is brilliant! Has organized my counter, looks professional, and gives me peace of mind that I won't accidentally melt anything left on the counter. And the extra outlets are a total bonus! I have only had this thing like a week and have told so many of my friends about it. Glamour girls best friend!
customer_reviews.author: ladyluck

customer_reviews.title: A must have for all hairstylists
customer_reviews.text: I love the stand. It’s amazing because I could fit a lot of newer tools that fit in the holders. I would buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Keke Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Yes!!!!! Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love!!!!!! My makeup/hair table is in our closet so outlets are hard to find. This holds everything I need. It's so sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: WayneMomOfThree

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit curling irons not even a 1 inch iron
customer_reviews.text: It’s a brilliant Idea but it wouldn’t even fit my curing iron any of them, will be returning, make sure you do measurements on your curling irons before you purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Knautz

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Love the plug in being on the stand. Holds hair dryer in large holder. Flat iron fits in closed holder. Curling iron fits in other closed ended holder. Brush and comb fits in other slots. Rubber gasket for the bottom was not so easy to put on, but that was because I wasn't looking at how it was suppose to fit. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: mkconner911

customer_reviews.title: on the station curling iron and blow dryer holder is great!!
customer_reviews.text: love it, with blowdry and curling irons in it, very sturdy, doesn’t tip! love that it has plugs on it too!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great For Home Use
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect! I use this at home to help keep my hair tools organized.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Martin

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my wife and it's a very cool gadget I never even knew existed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife and it's a very cool gadget I never even knew existed. It has room for brushes, blow dryers, straighteners etc. has plugs at the base so you can keep your cords tidy. I'm a little OCD so I love having everything beat and in this year place 😄 The quality seems decent and it's "holding up" just fine after two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Thebmyers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Dorm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter for her first time living in the dorms of college. It is good for its sturdy construction and weight to hold up to the daily use. I also like the added electrical plugs, because dorms are so limited in that way.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Organizers
customer_reviews.text: Love it just wish it had holders that flat irons.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Space saving
customer_reviews.text: I am editing my previous review because after setting it up it I realized I was mistaken and was not using it correctly. I like that it doesn't take up a lot of room and has multiple outlets.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: a must organizer for every home
customer_reviews.text: This is a great organizer for Hair iron and blow dry . the outlets are a blessing and the material is good
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my salon. Love that it has outlets. Makes it much easier to swap out different irons without having to find the wall socket every time.
customer_reviews.author: meghan mutchler

customer_reviews.title: and nice for storage of them
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it. Can put away hot dryers and curling irons with no worries, and nice for storage of them.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Billiter

customer_reviews.title: Great Countertop unit
customer_reviews.text: I recv'd this product as expected. It looks as described; nice steady desk top blow dryer & iron curling holder. Just what I needed, The additional outlets affixed to the unit really come in handy. Thank u 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Simone Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my vanity. Fits my straightener, curling wand, hair brush, and blow dryer on it without being too heavy or tipping it over.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect holder for my "toolbox" stylist station. Adequately weighted. Larger iron slot even accommodates my Croc flat iron.
customer_reviews.author: Kathair

customer_reviews.title: Just like pictured
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t gotten a chance to use this yet but it definitely came as described
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Faugue

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality love outlet on base. Fits heavy blow dryer and other tools and supports them well
customer_reviews.author: Jersey64

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: My bedroom is very lackluster in the outlet department so the fact that this product has built in outlets on it is amazing! I am using it to hold my straightener & hairdryer & they fit like a harm! I am using the other holders for brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Riss

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot, just wish the closed holder was longer. It works for my regular shorter curling iron but not for my curling wand. Also a place that can be used for a flat iron would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Brenn

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: No assembly required, it works perfectly and is exactly as described. A great value!!!
customer_reviews.author: MARI GOODMAN

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Use for storage of multiple hair tools. Plugs works great.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Cook

customer_reviews.title: Vanity 101
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this the only thing I would suggest is that they actually attach the extension cord instead of it being able to come off. Other than that I love it especially because it protects my vanity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I love this tabletop holder. It holds my two different size curling irons and my one straighter perfectly. I love the convenience of being able to plug them into the base of the holder instead of plugging them into the wall. My cords never get tangled up anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Gammy

customer_reviews.title: My appliances don't fit in the holder and with nowhere ...
customer_reviews.text: My appliances don't fit in the holder and with nowhere to wrap multiple cords it just made my counter top look messy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE love LOVE this
customer_reviews.text: LOVE love LOVE this! We only have one outlet in our bathroom and it is right next to the door. I was able to plug this in and put it on the other end of our vanity. Now I have three outlets on this holder and one open outlet on the wall!
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Love that this has the extra outlets and the sleek black design goes perfect in my bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This one works great! It's heavy enough and doesn't move around and ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a holder for the top of my salon station. This one works great! It's heavy enough and doesn't move around and has the added bonus of three electrical outlets. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It would make a great gift for someone who has a lot of hair tools!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best products I've ever purchased when it comes to items that hold things. Your hair tool and countertop will thank you...and so will your sanity.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Toffton

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, I love that it has the electrical outlets ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, I love that it has the electrical outlets on the stand and the cord is long enough to stretch behind my vanity. All of my styling utensils fit in the holders, blow dryer, straightener and curling iron. It doesn't look cheap either. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy jarrell

customer_reviews.title: Good home or salon use!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice piece to own! Hold and cools all my hot tools!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mcnabb

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived with chips all over the black finish so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Missing promised outlet attachment
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 4. Only 1 showed up w outlets attached. Sticker on outside of package confirms item was to have outlets. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stand
customer_reviews.text: Perfect stand for organizing hair care tools. Especially love the added outlets so only one cord needs to plug into the wall. Definitely helps manage cords.
customer_reviews.author: Cherster

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is a life saver. It’s so multi purpose. I love it. I’m ordering another one for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Quana

product_meta.title: Saloniture Tabletop Blow Dryer & Hair Iron Holder - Salon Appliance Stand w/ 3 Outlets
product_meta.description: This convenient tabletop appliance caddy is designed to hold and organize blow dryers, heat irons, straightening irons, curling irons, hot combs and other accessories. Both space saving and portable, it can be moved where needed throughout your salon, or brought to client meetings to create a professional workspace. A 2-3/4" (Dia) ring allows you to quickly stow and retrieve your blow dryer, including those fitted with nozzles or other attachments. It can also fit and store almost any flat or round hair iron and includes one storage tube measuring 1-3/4" (Dia) x 3-7/8" (D), two tubes both 1-1/4" (Dia) x 3-1/4" (D), and a side ring 1-1/4" (Dia). This appliance holder is extremely durable; constructed from high-grade steel in a heat resistant, black powder coat finish, it is very attractive and will last for years and years. A sturdy 8-5/8" wide base with a rubber anti-slip ring easily keeps this stand steady to support your appliances and tools. It also features 3 integrated outlets and a grounded, US standard, 3-prong power cord that is 5'-11" long. Only one wing nut needs to be fastened for quick assembly. Overall dimensions: 10" (W) x 9.5" (H).
feature_bullets: Organize all of your salon & hair appliances in one place
Made from high-grade steel in a beautiful black, powder coat finish
Space saving and portable; it can be used anywhere
